attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Dizzying Wind
attacks.text: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card from his or her hand during his or her next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that card has no effect. (Your opponent still discards that card.)

attacks.name: Noxious Scales
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Protect
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Coordinate

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Flare Command

name: AZ
rules: Put 1 of your Pokémon into your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that Pokémon.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Battle Compressor
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and discard them. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Dimension Valley
rules: Each Psychic Pokémon's attacks (both yours and your opponent's) cost Colorless less.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Enhanced Hammer
rules: Discard a Special Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Gengar Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Gengar-EX.

name: Hand Scope
rules: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Head Ringer
rules: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to cost Colorless more. When this card is removed from a Pokémon for any reason, put this card in its owner's discard pile.

name: Jamming Net
rules: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 20 less damage to all Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)When this card is removed from a Pokémon for any reason, put this card in its owner's discard pile.

name: Lysandre's Trump Card
rules: Each player shuffles all cards in his or her discard pile into his or her deck (except for Lysandre's Trump Card).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Manectric Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Manectric-EX.

name: Professor Sycamore
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Robo Substitute
rules: Play this card as if it were a 30 HP Colorless Basic Pokémon. At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat. If this card is Knocked Out, your opponent can't take any Prize cards for it.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Roller Skates
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, draw 3 cards.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Shauna
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Steel Shelter
rules: Each Metal Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting those Pokémon.)
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Target Whistle
rules: Put a Basic Pokémon from your opponent's discard pile onto his or her Bench.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Tierno
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: VS Seeker
rules: Put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Xerosic
rules: Choose a Pokémon Tool or Special Energy card attached to a Pokémon in play (yours or your opponent's) and discard it.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Double Colorless Energy
rules: Double Colorless Energy provides ColorlessColorless Energy.

name: Mystery Energy
rules: This card can only be attached to Psychic Pokémon. This card provides Psychic Energy, but only while this card is attached to a Psychic Pokémon. The Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is ColorlessColorless less. (If this card is attached to anything other than a Psychic Pokémon, discard this card.)
